content: उपगमः, --मनं {@--1@} Going to, drawing towards, approach; सीमंते च त्वदुपगमजं यत्र नीपं वधूनां <ls>Me. 65</ls> your advent; व्यावर्ततान्योपगमात्कुमारी <ls>R. 6. 69</ls>, <ls n="R.">9. 50.</ls> {@--2@} Knowledge, acquaintance. {@--3@} Attainment, acquiring; विश्वासोपगमादभिन्नगतयः <ls>Ś. 1. 14.</ls> {@--4@} Intercourse (as of the sexes). {@--5@} Society, company; न पुनरधमानामुपगमः <ls>H. 1. 136.</ls> {@--6@} Undergoing, suffering, feeling. {@--7@} Acceptance, receipt. {@--8@} An agreement, promise. {@--9@} A particular high number.
